:v-model.description: The initial value of the binding value, which is bound in both directions
:v-model.description_zh: 绑定value初始值，此值是双向绑定的

value.description: Enter the contents of the field

placeholder.description: A placeholder when the input box is empty

height.description: Enter the height of the box

confirmType.description: Set the text of the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard, only WeChat applet, App-vue and H5 are valid
confirmType.description_zh: 设置键盘右下角按钮的文字，仅微信小程序，App-vue和H5有效

count.description: Whether to display the word count

focus.description: Whether or not to automatically get focus, nvue does not support it, H5 depends on the browser's implementation
focus.description_zh: 是否自动获取焦点，nvue不支持，H5取决于浏览器的实现

autoHeight.description: Whether or not to increase the height automatically

ignoreCompositionEvent.description: Whether to ignore the handling of text composition system events within the component. If false, the compositionstart, compositionend, and compositionupdate events will be fired, and the input event will be triggered during text compositing
ignoreCompositionEvent.description_zh: 是否忽略组件内对文本合成系统事件的处理。为 false 时将触发 compositionstart、compositionend、compositionupdate 事件，且在文本合成期间会触发 input 事件

fixed.description: If the textarea is in the position:fixed region, you need to display the specified property fixed as true
fixed.description_zh: 如果textarea是在一个position:fixed的区域，需要显示指定属性fixed为true

cursorSpacing.description: Specifies the distance between the cursor and the keyboard
cursorSpacing.description_zh: 指定光标与键盘的距离

cursor.description: Specify the cursor position when focusing

showConfirmBar.description: Whether to display the bar with the "Done" button above the keyboard,
showConfirmBar.description_zh: 是否显示键盘上方带有”完成“按钮那一栏，

selectionStart.description: Cursor start position, effective when autofocusing, needs to be used with selection-end
selectionStart.description_zh: 光标起始位置，自动聚焦时有效，需与selection-end搭配使用

selectionEnd.description: The end of the cursor is effective when autofocusing, and needs to be used in conjunction with selection-start
selectionEnd.description_zh: 光标结束位置，自动聚焦时有效，需与selection-start搭配使用

adjustPosition.description: When the keyboard pops up, whether the page is automatically pushed up
adjustPosition.description_zh: 键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

disableDefaultPadding.description: Whether to remove the default padding under iOS, only WeChat Mini Programs are valid
disableDefaultPadding.description_zh: 是否去掉 iOS 下的默认内边距，只微信小程序有效

holdKeyboard.description: focus, do not put away the keyboard when clicking on the page, only the WeChat applet is effective
holdKeyboard.description_zh: focus时，点击页面的时候不收起键盘，只微信小程序有效

maxlength.description: The maximum input length is set to -1 without limiting the maximum length
maxlength.description_zh: 最大输入长度，设置为 -1 的时候不限制最大长度

border.description: Border type, surround - surrounded by borders, none - borderless, bottom - bottom border
border.description_zh: 边框类型，surround-四周边框，none-无边框，bottom-底部边框

placeholderClass.description: 指定placeholder的样式类，注意页面或组件的style中写了scoped时，需要在类名前写/deep/
placeholderClass.description_zh: 指定placeholder的样式类，注意页面或组件的style中写了scoped时，需要在类名前写/deep/

placeholderStyle.description: 指定placeholder的样式，字符串/对象形式，如"color: red;"
placeholderStyle.description_zh: 指定placeholder的样式，字符串/对象形式，如"color: red;"

formatter.description: Input filtering or formatting functions (if you need to be compatible with WeChat Mini Programs, you can only use the setFormatter method)
formatter.description_zh: 输入过滤或格式化函数(如需兼容微信小程序，则只能通过setFormatter方法)

events.name: focus
events.description: Triggered when the input box is focused

events.name: blur
events.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus
events.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发

events.name: confirm
events.description: Triggered when the Done button on the keyboard is clicked
events.description_zh: 点击键盘上的完成按钮时触发

events.name: linechange
events.description: Triggered when the number of rows in the input box changes
events.description_zh: 输入框行数变化时触发

events.name: keyboardheightchange
events.description: This event is triggered when the keyboard height changes
events.description_zh: 键盘高度发生变化的时候触发此事件

methods.name: setFormatter
methods.description: The internal methods exposed for compatibility with WeChat Mini Programs are explained above
methods.description_zh: 为兼容微信小程序而暴露的内部方法，见上方说明
